description: Retrieves the specified inline policy document that is embedded with the specified IAM role. An IAM role can also have managed policies attached to it. To retrieve a managed policy document that is attached to a role, use  GetPolicy to determine the policy's default version, then use  GetPolicyVersion to retrieve the policy document. For more information about policies, see Managed policies and inline policies in the IAM User Guide. For more information about roles, see IAM roles in the IAM User Guide.

parameters.name: RoleName
parameters.description: The name of the role associated with the policy. This parameter allows (through its regex pattern) a string of characters consisting of upper and lowercase alphanumeric characters with no spaces. You can also include any of the following characters: _+=,.@-

parameters.name: PolicyName
parameters.description: The name of the policy document to get. This parameter allows (through its regex pattern) a string of characters consisting of upper and lowercase alphanumeric characters with no spaces. You can also include any of the following characters: _+=,.@-

nested_items.name: RoleName
nested_items.description: The role the policy is associated with.
